name: MVC Acronynm
body: Did you know that MVC is an acronym that stands for something meaningful and not just the result of tech developers throwing darts at an eye chart? It stands for for Model-View-Controller, and not My Vinyl Collection like I was previously lead to believe...

name: Handlebars JS is Problematic
body: As we all know, women are vastly underrepresented in the tech field and it is very important that we fight to change that. So when I discovered Handlebars JS, a template language compatible with Javascript, and found that it uses a mustache as it's logo, I was outraged. A thick, beefy 'stache is a core symbol of masculinity in modern America and I was disgusted to learn that Handlebars JS is forcing digital bristles into the faces of developers all across the country. Please check back in the future for a link to the petition to take down Handlebars. Burn The Stache!
